接口的使用
javax.servlet.FilterConfig

  • 使用FilterConfig的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.servlet
    The javax.servlet package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.filters  
    org.apache.catalina.ssi
    This package contains code that is used by the SsiInvoker.
    org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server
    Server-side specific implementation classes.

    • javax.servlet中FilterConfig的使用

      参数类型为FilterConfig的javax.servlet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Filter.init(FilterConfig filterConfig)
      Called by the web container to indicate to a filter that it is being placed into service.

    • org.apache.catalina.core中FilterConfig的使用

      实现FilterConfig的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ApplicationFilterConfig
      Implementation of a javax.servlet.FilterConfig useful in managing the filter instances instantiated when a web application is first started.
      返回FilterConfig的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      FilterConfig StandardContext.findFilterConfig(java.lang.String name)
      Find and return the initialized FilterConfig for the specified filter name, if any; otherwise return null.
